Text.Language: Mwu~c/c piar,/p~rov/t/c: e~tafswpi qen pid~rumoc: afnau e~ou,~rwm qen oubatoc: oude m~pourwkh n~je nefk~latoc.
When Moses the Archprophet was in the wilderness, he saw a fire in a bush, but its branches did not burn.
